question: This is my first baby. Due August 254th! But now I just found out last week I have gestational diabetes,yay...no. Now I've got a diabetes apt. Next Friday! I've been trying to walk more and eat less ever since I found out.. Any other mommy's experience this? Or currently dealing with it?I'm super scared of the outcome. I don't want a unhealthy baby because of my bad sugar habits.lol
title: soon to be mommys
